actor-start.eventDescription: Initial fee for starting the MCP Server Actor

get-income-statements.eventDescription: Fee for getting income statements for a company.

get-balance-sheets.eventDescription: Fee for getting balance sheets for a company.

get-cash-flow-statements.eventDescription: Fee for getting cash flow statements for a company.

get-current-stock-price.eventDescription: Fee for getting the current / latest price of a company.

get-historical-stock-prices.eventDescription: Fee for getting historical stock prices for a company.

get-company-news.eventDescription: Fee for getting news for a company.

get-available-crypto-tickers.eventDescription: Fee for getting all available crypto tickers.

get-crypto-prices.eventDescription: Fee for getting current prices for a crypto currency.

get-historical-crypto-prices.eventDescription: Fee for getting historical prices for a crypto currency.

get-current-crypto-price.eventDescription: Fee for getting the current / latest price of a crypto currency.
